title: DSP Advertising Package
description: Adobe Advertising Cloud DSP Package Details.

dsp:packageStatus.title: Package Status
dsp:packageStatus.description: Package Status indicates if underlying ads are eligible to serve.

dsp:goalMetric.title: Goal Metric
dsp:goalMetric.description: The metric on which the pacing occurs so that the campaign hits the desired metric value over the course of its lifetime. E.g. SPEND, IMPRESSIONS

dsp:goalMetricValue.title: Goal Interval
dsp:goalMetricValue.description: The maximum value allowed for the metric to reach in a certain interval.

dsp:goalType.title: Goal Type
dsp:goalType.description: The action taken when the metric hits the maximum value.

dsp:goalInterval.title: Goal Interval
dsp:goalInterval.description: The time frame for which the metric value is computed. E.g. DAY, ALLTIME

dsp:pricePerUom.title: Price per Unit of Measure
dsp:pricePerUom.description: The price per unit of measure.

dsp:packageStartTime.title: Package Start Time
dsp:packageStartTime.description: The starting time of serving ads in placements linked to the campaign belonging to this package.

dsp:packageEndTime.title: Package End Time
dsp:packageEndTime.description: The end time of serving ads in placements linked to the campaign belonging to this package.

dsp:campaignId.title: Campaign Identifier
dsp:campaignId.description: Campaign Identifier on the display advertising platform which has this package associated.
